sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>scooter</radical> with <radical>horns</radical> with a <radical>pig</radical> riding on it will be able to <kanji>accomplish</kanji> anything.
meaningInfo: Imagine the pig scooting around. It is able to accomplish anything you can imagine (so go nuts with your imagination).
readingMnemonic: It was even able to successfully <kanji>accomplish</kanji> a feat that involved it jumping its scooter right into a <reading>swi</reading>ng (<ja>すい</ja>), swinging back and forth, then jumping off.
readingInfo: Perhaps it even takes the swing all the way around in a full 360 degree rotation. This horned scooter riding pig can truly accomplish anything.
